data.title: Salamanca Airport
data.meta_description: Salamanca Airport is a midsized airport in Salamanca, Castille and León, Spain. The airport is located at latitude 40.95215 and longitude -5.50165. The airport has 2 runways: 3/21 and 8/26.
data.text:
Salamanca Airport is a midsized airport in Salamanca, Castille and León, Spain. The airport is located at latitude 40.95215 and longitude -5.50165. The airport has 2 runways: 3/21 and 8/26. The ICAO airport code of this field is LESA. The airport's IATA code is SLM. Nearby other airfields are Calzada De Valdunciel, Aeródromo de Piedrahita, Valle Amblés, Aeródromo el Maíllo and Aerodrómo de Sanchidrián.

Salamanca Airport publishes a METAR. The flight information region (FIR) is Madrid.

Salamanca Airport is in the timezone of Europe/Madrid. Difference with UTC is +2 h. Today the sun rises at 07:33 and sets at 21:18. This applies to Salamanca Airport, the universal daylight period may be different. The difference between the local time and UTC is +2 hour. Daylight saving time is currently in progress.

Things to do at this airport

Go to Vliegles.nl to find flying lessons, skydives and other flying experiences. Browse the page for all available activities near Salamanca Airport. You can also use the search function to find specific flying lessons, skydives or other flying experiences near your place.
